name: Nugget Casino Resort
description: For more than 60 years the Nugget Casino Resort has been an iconic destination in Reno-Sparks. 1,380 guest rooms in twin 28-story towers, five restaurants, 110,000 sq ft of meeting space, year-round atrium pool, and three live entertainment venues.
shortDescription: Iconic Reno-Sparks resort with 1,380 rooms in twin towers, 8,500-seat event center, and 5 restaurants.

faqs.question: How big is Nugget Casino Resort?
faqs.answer: One of Reno-Sparks' largest properties with 1,380 rooms in twin 28-story towers, a full casino, 110,000 sq ft of meeting space, and the 8,500-seat Nugget Event Center for major concerts.

faqs.question: What dining options are available?
faqs.answer: Five restaurants including Rosie's Café (24-hour casual), Steakhouse at the Nugget (fine dining), and multiple quick-serve and bar options.

faqs.question: Does Nugget offer golf packages?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra creates custom packages with Nugget lodging and tee times at 20+ courses. The year-round atrium pool is a bonus. Call 888-584-8232.

testimonials.quote: Booked Nugget Casino Resort through Golf the High Sierra for our annual buddies trip. The group rate was excellent and having everything on one contract made logistics so simple. The property itself is well-maintained and staff was great.

testimonials.quote: Nugget Casino Resort is an ideal spot for a golf getaway in Reno / Sparks. Close to great courses, good restaurants on-site or nearby, and the rooms have everything you need. GTHS knows exactly which room blocks to reserve for groups.
testimonials.author: Nick L.

testimonials.quote: Stayed at Nugget Casino Resort for our golf trip and it was the perfect home base. Rooms were clean and spacious, location was ideal for hitting courses around Reno / Sparks. GTHS got us a group rate we couldn't find anywhere else.
